original_text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision. And so Abraham became the father of Isaac, and circumcised him on the eighth day, and Isaac became the father of Jacob, and Jacob of the twelve patriarchs.
korean_text: 할례의 언약을 아브라함에게 주셨더니 그가 이삭을 낳아 여드레 만에 할례를 행하고 이삭이 야곱을, 야곱이 우리 열두 조상을 낳으니라

sentences.original_text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision.
And so Abraham became the father of Isaac,
and circumcised him on the eighth day,
sentences.korean_translation: 여드레째 되는 날에 그에게 할례를 행했으며,

sentences.original_text: and Isaac became the father of Jacob,
and Jacob of the twelve patriarchs.
